mapper.sql: USER_ID, ROLE_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, USER_CH_NAME, USER_SEX, STATE, END_IP, CREATED_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, CREATED_USER
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sys_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_user
USER_ID,
ROLE_ID,
USER_NAME,
USER_PASSWORD,
USER_CH_NAME,
USER_SEX,
STATE,
END_IP,
CREATED_DATE,
UPDATE_DATE,
UPDATE_USER,
CREATED_USER,

mapper.update:
update sys_user
USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ROLE_ID = #{record.roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USER_NAME = #{record.userName,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_PASSWORD = #{record.userPassword,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_CH_NAME = #{record.userChName,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_SEX = #{record.userSex,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
END_IP = #{record.endIp,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{record.createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_DATE = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED_USER = #{record.createdUser,jdbcType=CHAR},

update sys_user set USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ROLE_ID = #{record.roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, USER_NAME = #{record.userName,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_PASSWORD = #{record.userPassword,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_CH_NAME = #{record.userChName,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_SEX = #{record.userSex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, END_IP = #{record.endIp,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED_DATE = #{record.createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED_USER = #{record.createdUser,jdbcType=CHAR}

update sys_user
ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_CH_NAME = #{userChName,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_SEX = #{userSex,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
END_IP = #{endIp,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=CHAR},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_user set ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_CH_NAME = #{userChName,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_SEX = #{userSex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, END_IP = #{endIp,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=CHAR} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT u.USER_ID as userId, u.ROLE_ID as roleId, u.USER_NAME as userName, u.USER_PASSWORD as userPassword, u.USER_SEX as userSex, u.USER_CH_NAME as userChName, u.STATE as state, u.END_IP as endIp, u.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, u.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate, u.UPDATE_USER as updateUser, u.CREATED_USER as createdUser, r.ROLE_NAME as roleName FROM sys_user AS u LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON u.ROLE_ID = r.ROLE_ID
AND (u.USER_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR u.USER_CH_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR r.ROLE_NAME=#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND u.ROLE_ID > 1
where u.USER_ID!=1 ORDER BY u.CREATED_DATE DESC
SELECT u.USER_NAME, u.GOOGLECODE_STATE, u.GOOGLECODE_SECRET FROM sys_user u where u.USER_NAME = #{username}
